row.entry: 52.225-3,(a), Alternates I, II, III, and IV

entry.p: Amend section 52.225-3 by—
a. Revising the date of the clause;
b. In paragraph (a), in the definition of “Free Trade Agreement country” removing “Canada,”;
c. Removing and reserving Alternate I;
d. Revising Alternate II;
e. Removing from the introductory text of Alternate III “25.1101(b)(1)(iv)” and adding “25.1101(b)(1)(iii)” in its place; and
f. Removing from the introductory text of Alternate IV “25.1101(b)(1)(v)” and adding “25.1101(b)(1)(iv)” in its place.

Amend section 52.225-5 by—
a. Revising the date of the clause; and
b. In paragraph (a), in the definition “Designated country” removing “Canada,” from paragraph (2).

row.entry: 52.225-11, definition “Designated country” paragraph (2), Alternate I, and Alt I paragraph (b)(1)

entry.p: Amend section 52.225-11 by—
a. Revising the date of the clause;
b. In paragraph (a), in the definition of “Designated country”, removing “Canada,” from paragraph (2);
c. Revising the date of Alternate I; and
d. In paragraph (b)(1) of Alternate I:
i. Removing the phrase “FAR”; and
ii. Removing the phrase “NAFTA” and adding “United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement” in its place.
